metadata.description: Archie’s new art book is a beautifully-designed celebration of Francesco Francavilla’s time at Archie. This art book is a gorgeously designed edition featuring the complete collection of his comic book covers and more. This title goes behind-the-scenes on Francavilla’s work and its place in Archie’s history, with an insider’s look at the creation and ongoing legacy with the company.
metadata.name: The Archie Art of Francesco Francavilla
